head.title: Compare {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}} Library
head.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, generate detailed comparison reports for {{Runtime}} applications.

header.title: Compare {{FileFormatUp}} in {{Runtime}}
header.description: {{ProdShortName}} is a {{Runtime}}-based library that allows you to easily compare and identify differences in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Boost your solution’s efficiency in document comparison tasks with this powerful tool.
header.subtitle: File comparison solution

about.title: Discover the features of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is an API designed for comparing images and documents in the same format. It detects differences in paragraphs, words, characters, shapes, and text styles between the compared files. You can merge these changes and save them into a final document. It supports a variety of formats including PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio diagrams, Outlook emails, HTML files, drawings, and multiple image formats—all without requiring any additional software.

content.title: Use [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) to compare {{FileFormatUp}} files and generate detailed difference reports.

content.step_3: Add the second {{FileFormatUp}} file to the Comparer.
content.step_4: Generate a comprehensive report outlining all detected differences.

header.title: PDF comparison for {{EnvName}}

about.title: Key features of the {{ProdFullName}} Library
about.content: Generate detailed reports on any differences within PDF documents directly in your {{ProgLang}} applications. With just a few lines of code, use {{ProdFullName}} without the need for any extra software or libraries. Monitor changes in paragraphs, words, characters, shapes, and text styles within your PDFs. You can also merge changes from multiple document versions into a single result. Process documents quickly and easily, without hassle.
